import React, { Component } from "react"; import { fetchCart } from "../../JS/actions/product"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { logout, checkAuthenticated, load_user, } from "../../JS/actions/account"; class OrderSummary extends Component { componentDidMount() { const fetchData = async () => { try { await this.props.checkAuthenticated(); await this.props.load_user(); await this.props.fetchCart(this.props.account.user.id); } catch (err) {} }; fetchData(); } render() { return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.account.user, cart: state.product.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart })(OrderSummary);
